titleStmt.title: Poems on several occasions Humbly dedicated to the right honourable the Marchioness of Tavestock. By the author.
titleStmt.author: Walwyn, Herbert.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for William Chandler, at the Peacock in the Poultry; and William Davis, at the Bull over against the Royal Exhange in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Herbert Walwyn.
